images.title: Integrations Stack
images.prompt: A minimal icon on pure white background (#FFFFFF) representing multiple integrations. Three slightly offset rounded rectangles stacked diagonally, outlined with 1.5px stroke in primary blue (#3B82F6). Each rectangle has a small symbol hint: the top shows a database icon, the middle a cloud glyph, the bottom an API bracket. A thin secondary color (#10B981) line runs down the left side of the stack, connecting all three to a small circle node at bottom, suggesting routing. Very light blue fill at 15% opacity inside the cards. Generous white space, at least 15% padding from bounds. Rounded caps and joins on all strokes.

images.title: Global Reach
images.prompt: A simplified globe icon on pure white background (#FFFFFF). A 48px circle contains a minimal abstract world outline made from three gently curved latitude/longitude segments in 1.5px primary blue (#3B82F6) stroke. Three small secondary (#10B981) dots mark different regions around the globe. A thin blue ring hugs the inside of the circle. Very light blue fill at 12% opacity behind the globe. Lots of white space, no text. Rounded stroke caps.

images.title: Growth Metrics
images.prompt: A minimal growth icon on white background (#FFFFFF). Two vertical bars side by side with 1.5px primary blue (#3B82F6) stroke: the left bar shorter, the right bar taller. The right bar has a small upward arrow emerging from its top in success green (#10B981). Beneath the bars, a thin baseline in light gray (#E5E7EB). Bar interiors have a soft blue fill at 18% opacity. Percentage labels optional. Simple geometric sans-serif style. Rounded stroke caps.

images.title: Automation Engine
images.prompt: A gear-and-slider icon on white background (#FFFFFF). A simple 6-tooth gear outlined in primary blue (#3B82F6) with 1.5px stroke sits slightly left of center. Overlapping its right side are two vertical slider tracks: each a track line in light gray with a circular handle in secondary green (#10B981). The gear has a light blue tint at 15% opacity. All shapes have rounded corners and joins. White space at least 15% from icon bounds.

images.title: API Integration
images.prompt: A minimal API icon on white background (#FFFFFF). A rounded rectangle device outline in primary blue (#3B82F6) with 1.5px stroke, representing a terminal or interface. Inside, angled brackets < > with a forward slash between them. A small connection node (circle) attached to one side with a short line suggests connectivity. A tiny secondary green (#10B981) dot in the corner represents status indicator. No logos or brand names. Rounded caps on all strokes.

style.color_temperature: Cool blue with small green accent

images.title: Security Shield
images.prompt: A minimal security shield icon on pure white background (#FFFFFF). The shield is an outlined shape with 1.5px primary blue (#3B82F6) stroke, bottom corners softly rounded (8px radius). In the center of the shield, a small checkmark in the same stroke weight. The interior has a very light blue fill at 18% opacity, creating a duotone effect. Plenty of white space around the shape. Rounded stroke caps and joins.

images.title: Lightning Speed
images.prompt: A geometric lightning bolt icon in primary blue (#3B82F6) on white background (#FFFFFF), with two short horizontal motion lines trailing behind in light gray (#CBD5E1). The bolt has 1.5px rounded strokes and a pale blue fill at 15% opacity. The icon symbolizes fast performance and instant results. Generous white space, rounded caps on all strokes.

images.title: Analytics Chart
images.prompt: A simple three-bar chart icon on white background (#FFFFFF). Bars of increasing height from left to right with primary blue (#3B82F6) outlines (1.5px stroke) and light blue fill at 20% opacity, sitting on a gray baseline (#E5E7EB). Above the bars, a thin secondary green (#10B981) trend line with two small circular data points. Clean vector style. Rounded stroke caps.

style.focal_point: Rising bar cluster with trend line

images.title: Input → Process → Output Flow
images.prompt: A left-to-right flow diagram on white background (#FFFFFF) showing three main steps. Step 1: a circle with a document/data icon inside, label 'Input' below. Step 2: a rounded square (12px radius) with primary blue (#3B82F6) outline and fill at 10% opacity, label 'Acme' or 'Process', containing a small gear icon. Step 3: a rounded square with light gray outline, label 'Output', containing a checkmark icon. Smooth secondary green (#10B981) curved arrows (1.5px stroke) connect Input → Process → Output using bezier curves. Below the flow, small badges indicate data types flowing through. All icons are simple outlines with rounded caps.

images.title: User Journey Steps
images.prompt: A four-step process flow on white background (#FFFFFF), read left-to-right. Each step is a numbered circle (1, 2, 3, 4) above a small icon: 1) 'Discover' with a search/magnifier icon; 2) 'Evaluate' with a checklist icon; 3) 'Activate' with a power/play icon; 4) 'Succeed' with a trophy/star icon. Steps are connected by thin primary blue (#3B82F6) lines (1.5px) with rounded arrowheads. Labels below each step in short uppercase text. The active step (Activate) has filled blue circle with white number; others are outline-only. Rounded caps on all strokes.

images.title: Metrics Snapshot
images.prompt: A compact infographic on white background (#FFFFFF) showing three vertical metric cards in a row. Each card is a tiny rounded rectangle (8px radius) with an icon at top (chart, users, clock), a number beneath it, and a percentage change badge at the bottom — green (#10B981) for positive. Cards are outlined in light gray (#E5E7EB) with primary blue (#3B82F6) accent highlights. A subtle dashed baseline connects all three cards. Simple geometric sans-serif text. Rounded stroke caps.

images.title: ROI Visualization
images.prompt: A small infographic icon on white background (#FFFFFF) showing ROI: a dollar/currency symbol in primary blue (#3B82F6) on the left, and a vertical stack of two rounded rectangles on the right — 'Cost' (small, light gray) and 'Revenue' (larger, primary blue fill at 20% opacity). A green (#10B981) arrow arcs from the small bar to the large bar, indicating positive return. Everything outlined with 1.5px strokes, minimal fill. Rounded caps and joins.

images.title: Time Saved
images.prompt: An icon on white background (#FFFFFF) showing time efficiency: a clock (40px circle) with primary blue (#3B82F6) outline (1.5px stroke) and simple hands at 10:10 position. A small double-chevron (>>) in secondary green (#10B981) sits beside the clock suggesting fast-forward/speed. Light blue fill inside the clock at 12% opacity. Generous white space. Rounded stroke caps on all elements.
